references.reason: This paper introduces domain-adversarial training, a foundational method for unsupervised domain adaptation, which is central to the paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable features with deep adaptation networks
references.reason: This paper introduces deep adaptation networks (DAN), another key method for unsupervised domain adaptation that the current paper builds on.

references.paper_title: AdaTime: A benchmarking suite for domain adaptation on time series data
references.reason: This paper provides a benchmark suite for time-series domain adaptation, which is used for evaluating the performance of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Domain adaptation for time series under feature and label shifts
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it also addresses time-series domain adaptation and explores the use of frequency features, a key aspect of the current work.

references.paper_title: Multi-source deep domain adaptation with weak supervision for time-series sensor data
references.reason: This paper tackles multi-source domain adaptation in time series, a related but more complex problem that provides context and comparison for the proposed method.
